name: crime, law and justice
description: Establishment and/or statement of the rules of behaviour in society, the enforcement of these rules, breaches of the rules and the punishment of offenders. Organisations and bodies involved in these activities.

name: arts, culture and entertainment
description: Matters pertaining to the advancement and refinement of the human mind, of interests, skills, tastes and emotions
used_for: book review, theater annoncement, cinema programm

name: disaster, accident and emergency incident
description: Man made and natural events resulting in loss of life or injury to living creatures and/or damage to inanimate objects or property.

name: economy, business and finance
description: All matters concerning the planning, production and exchange of wealth.

name: education
description: All aspects of furthering knowledge of human individuals from birth to death.

name: environment
description: All aspects of protection, damage, and condition of the ecosystem of the planet earth and its surroundings.

name: health
description: All aspects pertaining to the physical and mental welfare of human beings.

name: human interest
description: Items about individuals, groups, animals, plants or other objects with a focus on emotional facets

name: labour
description: Social aspects, organisations, rules and conditions affecting the employment of human effort for the generation of wealth or provision of services and the economic support of the unemployed.

name: lifestyle and leisure
description: Activities undertaken for pleasure, relaxation or recreation outside paid employment, including eating and travel.

name: politics
description: Local, regional, national and international exercise of power, or struggle for power, and the relationships between governing bodies and states.

name: religion and belief
description: All aspects of human existence involving theology, philosophy, ethics and spirituality.

name: science and technology
description: All aspects pertaining to human understanding of nature and the physical world and the development and application of this knowledge

name: society
description: Aspects of the life of humans affecting its relationships

name: sport
description: Competitive exercise involving physical effort. Organizations and bodies involved in these activities.

name: conflicts, war and peace
description: Acts of socially or politically motivated protest and/or violence and actions to end them

name: weather
description: The study, reporting and prediction of meteorological phenomena.

name: advertisement
description: A message printed in the newspaper in space paid for by the advertiser.

name: comic strip
description: Three-or four-panel drawings that tell a story, usually humorous.

name: editorial cartoon
description: Drawing on editorial page employing exaggeration, satire, and symbolism.

name: feature story
description: A story that goes further than straight news coverage, and usually focuses on the human interest elements of a situation or event. The feature story may be written to inform or entertain, and it can be on a multitude of topics from the trivial (students favorite singing groups) to the serious (teenage depression).
